languages.text: А еще рекли: "Бысти нам проклятыми без святой защиты твоей, ибо страшимся мы пагубы от родичей наших, яко дома остались. Впали они в крамолу кровавую, и душегубствуют, и не щадят никого, и от света Императора горнего отпали".

And they spake further saying, "Without thy holy protection, we are doomed, for we fear annihilation at the hands of our kin who remained behind. For, having fallen away from the sublime light of the Emperor, they have descended into bloody sedition and become murtherers of no mercy."
languages.original_text: А еще рекли: "Бысти нам проклятыми без святой защиты твоей, ибо страшимся мы пагубы от родичей наших, яко дома остались. Впали они в крамолу кровавую, и душегубствуют, и не щадят никого, и от света Императора горнего отпали".

traits.locale_text: And they spake further saying, "Without thy holy protection, we are doomed, for we fear annihilation at the hands of our kin who remained behind. For, having fallen away from the sublime light of the Emperor, they have descended into bloody sedition and become murtherers of no mercy."

And they spake further saying, "Without thy holy protection, we are doomed, for we fear annihilation at the hands of our kin who remained behind. For, having fallen away from the sublime light of the Emperor, they have descended into bloody sedition and become murtherers of no mercy."

And they spake further saying, "Without thy holy protection, we are doomed, for we fear annihilation at the hands of our kin who remained behind. For, having fallen away from the sublime light of the Emperor, they have descended into bloody sedition and become murtherers of no mercy."

And they spake further saying, "Without thy holy protection, we are doomed, for we fear annihilation at the hands of our kin who remained behind. For, having fallen away from the sublime light of the Emperor, they have descended into bloody sedition and become murtherers of no mercy."

And they spake further saying, "Without thy holy protection, we are doomed, for we fear annihilation at the hands of our kin who remained behind. For, having fallen away from the sublime light of the Emperor, they have descended into bloody sedition and become murtherers of no mercy."

languages.text: Siguieron hablando, diciendo: «Sin vuestra sacra protección estamos condenados, pues tememos que nuestros hermanos, que quedaron atrás y se distanciaron de la sublime luz del Emperador para cometer sedición y convertirse en asesinos despiadados, acabarán con nosotros».
languages.original_text: And they spake further saying, "Without thy holy protection, we are doomed, for we fear annihilation at the hands of our kin who remained behind. For, having fallen away from the sublime light of the Emperor, they have descended into bloody sedition and become murtherers of no mercy."

traits.locale_text: Siguieron hablando, diciendo: «Sin vuestra sacra protección estamos condenados, pues tememos que nuestros hermanos, que quedaron atrás y se distanciaron de la sublime luz del Emperador para cometer sedición y convertirse en asesinos despiadados, acabarán con nosotros».

languages.text: 他们继续说道：“如果得不到你的神圣庇护，我们难逃一死，因为紧随我们而来的同族恐怕会杀了我们。他们已经违逆了帝皇的至高之光，陷入了嗜血的暴行之中，沦为了无情的杀人凶手。”
languages.original_text: And they spake further saying, "Without thy holy protection, we are doomed, for we fear annihilation at the hands of our kin who remained behind. For, having fallen away from the sublime light of the Emperor, they have descended into bloody sedition and become murtherers of no mercy."

traits.locale_text: 他们继续说道：“如果得不到你的神圣庇护，我们难逃一死，因为紧随我们而来的同族恐怕会杀了我们。他们已经违逆了帝皇的至高之光，陷入了嗜血的暴行之中，沦为了无情的杀人凶手。”

languages.text: さらに続けて言う。「あなたの聖なる守りがなければ、我々はおしまいです。残された同族の手で滅ぼされるのではないかと恐ろしいのです。彼らは皇帝の崇高なる光から離れて、血生臭い暴動を起こし、無情な殺人者になってしまった」
languages.original_text: And they spake further saying, "Without thy holy protection, we are doomed, for we fear annihilation at the hands of our kin who remained behind. For, having fallen away from the sublime light of the Emperor, they have descended into bloody sedition and become murtherers of no mercy."

traits.locale_text: さらに続けて言う。「あなたの聖なる守りがなければ、我々はおしまいです。残された同族の手で滅ぼされるのではないかと恐ろしいのです。彼らは皇帝の崇高なる光から離れて、血生臭い暴動を起こし、無情な殺人者になってしまった」

languages.text: Und so verkündeten sie "Ohne Euren heiligen Schutz sind wir verloren, denn wir fürchten die Auslöschung durch unsere Brüder und Schwestern, die zurückblieben. Denn als sie sich vom erhabenen Licht des Imperators abwandten, fielen sie blutigen Aufständen anheim und wurden Mörder ohne jede Gnade."
languages.original_text: And they spake further saying, "Without thy holy protection, we are doomed, for we fear annihilation at the hands of our kin who remained behind. For, having fallen away from the sublime light of the Emperor, they have descended into bloody sedition and become murtherers of no mercy."

traits.locale_text: Und so verkündeten sie "Ohne Euren heiligen Schutz sind wir verloren, denn wir fürchten die Auslöschung durch unsere Brüder und Schwestern, die zurückblieben. Denn als sie sich vom erhabenen Licht des Imperators abwandten, fielen sie blutigen Aufständen anheim und wurden Mörder ohne jede Gnade."

languages.text: « Sans votre divine protection, nous sommes condamnés, poursuivent-ils. Nous serons anéantis par nos propres frères et sœurs demeurés en arrière. Car ils se sont écartés de la voie que nous trace la lumière suprême de l'Empereur. Ils ont sombré dans une sédition sanglante et ne sont plus que d'impitoyables bourreaux. »
languages.original_text: And they spake further saying, "Without thy holy protection, we are doomed, for we fear annihilation at the hands of our kin who remained behind. For, having fallen away from the sublime light of the Emperor, they have descended into bloody sedition and become murtherers of no mercy."

traits.locale_text: « Sans votre divine protection, nous sommes condamnés, poursuivent-ils. Nous serons anéantis par nos propres frères et sœurs demeurés en arrière. Car ils se sont écartés de la voie que nous trace la lumière suprême de l'Empereur. Ils ont sombré dans une sédition sanglante et ne sont plus que d'impitoyables bourreaux. »

languages.text: Sözlerini devam ettirdiler: "Sizin ilahi korumanız olmadan sonumuz geldi demektir, arkamızda kalan soydaşlarımızın elinde yok olmaktan korkuyoruz. İmparator'un yüce ışığından uzaklaşarak kanlı bir fesada düştüler, merhametsiz katillere dönüştüler."
languages.original_text: And they spake further saying, "Without thy holy protection, we are doomed, for we fear annihilation at the hands of our kin who remained behind. For, having fallen away from the sublime light of the Emperor, they have descended into bloody sedition and become murtherers of no mercy."

traits.locale_text: Sözlerini devam ettirdiler: "Sizin ilahi korumanız olmadan sonumuz geldi demektir, arkamızda kalan soydaşlarımızın elinde yok olmaktan korkuyoruz. İmparator'un yüce ışığından uzaklaşarak kanlı bir fesada düştüler, merhametsiz katillere dönüştüler."
